content.p: The Dearing Award (link to the UK site) is the main teaching award offered by the University of Nottingham. This award seeks to recognise outstanding staff at all campuses who contribute to the student learning experience. Nominations for the Dearing Award can be made by staff and students. Recent winners at UNMC include Dr. Andrew Morris (Pharmacy) and Dr. Tim Brailsford (Computer Science). Full details on nominations and awards can be found on the UK webpages. Please make sure that you nominate an outstanding member of UNMC staff! telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
